name: Checker Chess
description:
Checkers Chess is a game where checkers pieces play against chess pieces. Obviously, just taking the mechanics of both games directly would make it very unfair, so a few changes have been made. Such changes include:

  • A "void" zone that only checkers pieces can go to to prevent chess pieces from hugging walls
  • The objective of the checkers pieces is not to capture the chess king, but all of the chess pieces
  • The checkers pieces can move in all four cardinal directions as well, provided they are promoted
  • The back four pieces of the checkers pieces start off promoted to prevent 1 queen from terrorising every checkers piece from behind

Important: I haven't make a menu screen, so you need to refresh the tab to replay.

Note: This is pre-release version. Expect bug in game, please help report.
